xboxlive_agegroup_for_user.htm+html.head: xboxlive_agegroup_for_user.htm+html.body.p:137-3
xboxlive_agegroup_for_user: The above code checks the age group of the activating user and sets a global variable to <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt> depending on the returned constant.
